Texts.Eng: Care to try a simpler life, ^green;breeding bees^white; and reaping the profits? Build a ^orange;Bee Station^white; and you can get started.
Texts.Chs: 你厌倦了打打杀杀的生活？想重新开始一种更为自然的生活，或许你可以试试^green;养殖蜜蜂^white;。快去建造一个^orange;蜂场工作台^white;，然后你就可以体验到休闲生活的乐趣了。

Texts.Eng: With the ^orange;Bee Station^white;, you'll be able to craft a whole new array of goods you've likely not seen before!
Texts.Chs: 你可以在^orange;蜂场工作台^white;中制作一些你从未见过的东西。
